q: Headteachers will be able to discipline pupils who misbehave on their way to and from school but rules forcing teachers to give parents 24 hours notice of a detention will be scrapped. Mr Michael Gove said: This Government backs teachers. All the evidence from those countries with great education systems tells us that nothing is more important than attracting great people into teaching and supporting them in the classroom. "Teachers will be free to impose the penalties they need to keep order and free from the red tape which swallows up teaching time, so they can get on with their first duty- raising standards. But the bill also includes an unexpected additional clause making university students pay higher rates of interest on tuition fee loans. The Government says this has to be included before the new university funding regime

to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking.
